about_the_game:
Space Storm is an action-packed 2D game in which you control a futuristic spaceship to fight against enemy fleets. In dicey situations, you have the option of teleporting to another location to avoid dangerous attacks.

Your aim is to destroy all opponents in a wave without being destroyed yourself. After you have defeated a wave, a mothership appears that spawns more enemies. There are enemies that chase you and even some that shoot a fireball at you when you destroy them! What's more, the enemies become more difficult to hit with each level - some turn into tiny dots that require extreme precision.

The game comprises a total of 50 levels that become increasingly challenging. Your skill, quick reflexes and tactical thinking are required to master the challenges. Will you survive the star storm? Only the best will make it!

short_description: Steer a futuristic spaceship through 50 action-packed levels! Fight against enemy fleets, use teleportation, dodge fireballs and defeat the mothership. Precision and skill are required to survive increasingly difficult waves. Are you ready?
